"A.P.238/4/8": "Oh, it's you? Hey, Rela, say hello."
"Remember, a greeting should put people at ease."
"By the way, have you entered this Battle Championship I've heard so much about?"
"I only ask because it's supposed to be starting quite soon."
"I understand that you have to team up with someone. Did you come here looking for a partner?"
"I don't really care about the tournament, but it'll be interesting to see how you do."
"Let's see... Do you know what I mean if I say it's a test of strength for your fellow ARKS?"

"〔In that case〕〔I will attend!〕
〔I am confident〕〔about a test of strength!〕"
